  <script id="sna-iframe-storage" type="text/javascript">
   let storageSupported = false;
            try {
            storageSupported = window.localStorage && true;
            } catch (e) {}

            if (!storageSupported) {
            Object.defineProperty(window, 'localStorage', {
                value: {
                _data: {},
                setItem: function (id, val) {
                    return (this._data[id] = String(val));
                },
                getItem: function (id) {
                    return this._data.hasOwnProperty(id) ? this._data[id] : undefined;
                },
                removeItem: function (id) {
                    return delete this._data[id];
                },
                clear: function () {
                    return (this._data = {});
                }
                }
            });

            Object.defineProperty(window, 'sessionStorage', {
                value: {
                _data: {},
                setItem: function (id, val) {
                    return (this._data[id] = String(val));
                },
                getItem: function (id) {
                    return this._data.hasOwnProperty(id) ? this._data[id] : undefined;
                },
                removeItem: function (id) {
                    return delete this._data[id];
                },
                clear: function () {
                    return (this._data = {});
                }
                }
            });
            }
  </script>
  <script id="sna-consent" type="text/javascript">
   (() => {
  const callbacks = [];
  let consentRef = null;
  window.getSnaConsent = (callback) => {
      if(consentRef){ callback(consentRef) };
      callbacks.push(callback);
  };
  window.updateSnaConsent = (consent) => {
      consentRef = consent;
      callbacks.forEach((callback) => callback(consent));
  }
  getSnaConsent(() => { dataLayer.push({event: 'SNAConsentUpdated'}) });
})()
  </script>

  <script id="bread-payment-1">
   var smartEditLoadStarted = false;
      if (window && window.location && /\/cx-preview*?/g.test(window.location.pathname)) {
        var interval = window.setInterval(function () {
          if (window.__smartedit__ && window.__smartedit__.SmarteditFactory) {
            // IMPORTANT
            // This can be removed after testing
            console.log('smart edit still loading', new Date().toISOString());
            smartEditLoadStarted = true;
          } else if (window.__smartedit__ && !window.__smartedit__.SmarteditFactory) {
            // IMPORTANT
            // This can be removed after testing
            console.log('Smart edit finished loading. Start loading SDK');
            window.clearInterval(interval);
            injectSDK();
          }
        }, 500);
      } else if (window) {
        injectSDK();
      }

      function injectSDK() {
        var apiKey = 'd85bb52f-bb3d-431d-a7d7-a95804e689ef';
        // Create Config
        var config = {};
        config.src = 'https://connect-preview.breadpayments.com/unified.sdk.js';
        config.dataset = {
          breadMerchantKey: apiKey
        };

        //Inject Script
        var jsSdkScriptId = 'bread-js-sdk';
        var bodyNode = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
        if (document.getElementById(jsSdkScriptId)) {
          document.getElementById(jsSdkScriptId).remove();
        }

        var jsSdkScript = document.createElement('script');
        jsSdkScript.src = config.src;
        jsSdkScript.id = jsSdkScriptId;
        jsSdkScript.async = true;
        for (var key in config.dataset) {
          jsSdkScript.dataset[key] = config.dataset[key];
        }
        bodyNode.appendChild(jsSdkScript);
      }
  </script>
  <script async="" data-bread-merchant-key="d85bb52f-bb3d-431d-a7d7-a95804e689ef" id="bread-js-sdk" src="https://connect-preview.breadpayments.com/unified.sdk.js">
  </script>

   javascript: (function () {
        allowCopyAndPaste = function (e) {
          e.stopImmediatePropagation();
          return true;
        };
        document.addEventListener("onselect", allowCopyAndPaste, true);
        document.addEventListener("select", allowCopyAndPaste, true);
        document.addEventListener("copy", allowCopyAndPaste, true);
        document.addEventListener("paste", allowCopyAndPaste, true);
        document.addEventListener("onpaste", allowCopyAndPaste, true);
        document.addEventListener("onchange", allowCopyAndPaste, true);
      })();

      document.body.onclick = function (e) {
        if (e.target.localName === "input") {

          return true;
